description: This dashboard was created to monitor PostgreSQL metrics on Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform (AAP) and uses postgres_exporter.

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Time spent processing the verification of files that are written to disk.
sync_time - Time spent processing the verification of files that are synchronized to disk.

title: AAP - PostgreSQL Database
